labels.name: feature
labels.value: As a user I want to have the possibility to sign up (register) so I could create an account with my custom settings

labels.name: story
labels.value: Check if once a user has registered the user can register again with the same email or not

labels.name: suite
labels.value: As a user I want to have the possibility to sign up (register) so I could create an account with my custom settings

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Check if once a user has registered the user can register again with the same email or not

labels.name: package
labels.value: src.test.resources.features.ui.Registration_feature.As a user I want to have the possibility to sign up (register) so I could create an account with my custom settings

name: Check if once a user has registered the user can register again with the same email or not

steps.name: Given the user is on the sign up page
Given a user has already registered
When create an account button is clicked
Then the user returns to the registration page again
And the user tries to register with the same e-mail account
Then create an account button is clicked
And the user should be displayed a proper error message showing e-mail already exists
